4.30.17  2:02 pm   Why can't crop circles be square?

     they can, but don't blame me if everyone keeps asking you why you call them circles if they are actually square

4.30.17  1:57 pm   regarding your 2 step program: what if new, interesting content is made by other people now. what if your friend says "hey check out this mind blowing video i saw, that was just released yesterday. it contained new ideas for me to absorb."

     i think it's important, and after this video is done i would be looking for an effficient and organized way to brief myself on new content on a regular basis. but not particilarly for my own enjoyment. don't get me wrong. all content is fantastically enjoyable, i've just seen heard and been inspired by so much content already that i pretty much just get uncomfortable with inspiration, and desperate to do my work. i'm not going to live forever. but i am seriously interested in finding an organized way to keep in touch. but actually not too much because it can be easier to think outside the box if you don't know where the box is

     i'm sure he's at least as old as me

     pretty cool, i suppose

4.30.17  11:57 am   are you dead, jimbo?

     jimbo may be dead. i actually don't know who that is

4.30.17  11:51 am   you talked about your 2 step program of first consuming content and then creating it. I've been stuck on the consuming step for years, and have been wanting to go to the creating step for a while now. I've tried a bunch of different forms of creating and nothing really got me hooked... how do you decide what to create? or even determine what you're good at so you don't waste time trying to create for no reason?

     for me there were always too many ways, which actually made it impossible. there were always 100 ways i 'could' just pursue a career working for someone else as a side person. but i guess i just was too picky, and also crazy, so the only thing that made sense was to do everything myself, and there were always strong signs that that was possible because i have always picked up skills easily from a young age. but the more skills i got, the bigger and more insane the ideas and goals got. and i was just drowning and had no idea how to figure out what to do. and as time passed, it only got bigger and bigger and more insane. but i began documenting my journey early on, which sort of helped tie the entire struggle together into one cohesive story. and sure enough, after a few more chapters, and a few more layers of unmanageble expansion, just when i thought i was in way too deep to ever find my way, i just snapped and started a brute force approach which was to just start doing 5 'things' a week, ruthlessly, and never stopping, and posting it online. and then evolving the project from there, as needed, knowing that once it's underway i can surely steer it to hit every corner in due time

4.30.17  11:44 am   What are your thoughts on the words "plum" "mango" and "ball"?

     they are ok

     Each to me sounds wonderfully delightful and very apt for what they're naming.

4.30.17  10:37 am   How to escape a mental institute?

     act normal, and be very patient. and while you're waiting, you can make plans to never get back in, because it's a real waste of time and doesn't help you mentally. although it's good practice acting normal, which is what you will need to do to avoid going back again in the future

4.29.17  11:14 pm   bill what happens when I don't think things have inherent meaning

4.29.17  11:14 pm   do you spend time looking at other people's art + creations too. I think most people spend more time listening to or looking at other people's creations than actually creating, but it depends what you mean by creating I guess, do you think you are the same?

      i am on a 2 step program. step one is consume as many different types of content as possible, for many years, and get more and more enriched while also becoming more and more sad and jealous, wanting more and more desperately to create your own content, knowing and hoping in the future that some day the whole thing will flip around and you will be making mad content regularly. step 2 is when it actually does flip around and you start actually doing the content. currently on step 2

4.29.17  11:11 pm   how long did it take you to do the small fixes and adjustments for hoj
